content.html: Working in a large tech company, one thing I wish every team had (but barely any have it): A “map” of the teams that you depend on, that depend on you, and ones that are coupled to your work in one way or the other. One map for engineering teams; another for non-eng ones.
content.value:
Working in a large tech company, one thing I wish every team had (but barely any have it):

A “map” of the teams that you depend on, that depend on you, and ones that are coupled to your work in one way or the other.

One map for engineering teams; another for non-eng ones.
